methods.name: Run
methods.logic: Executes the decompression optimization phase. It takes PipelineData (likely containing the intermediate representation of the code being compiled) and a temporary Zone (likely for memory allocation) as input. The exact details of the decompression optimization depend on the implementation in the associated .cc file, but it probably involves analyzing and rewriting parts of the IR to make decompression more efficient.

constants.name: DECL_TURBOSHAFT_PHASE_CONSTANTS(DecompressionOptimization)
constants.logic: This macro likely declares constants (possibly a static string for phase name or flags) associated with the DecompressionOptimization phase. The exact effect depends on the definition of the macro, but it would be for use by the turboshaft pipeline.
